work.title: AI Researcher
work.description:
● Skilled in foundational machine learning, supervised and unsupervised learning, with a focus on regression and neural networks.

● Since the release of OpenAI Codex in 2021, I have been conducting AI research in the domain of building compliant mechanisms to address African operational inefficiencies.

● I am working on an open-source leapfrog manual that will be a guideline for leveraging existing systems available in Western regions to solve African operational problems with Artificial Intelligence.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer at SweepSouth
work.description:
● Conducted software audits for the existing tech stack to identify bottlenecks in codebase.

● Migrated legacy code into a new SPA framework, SvelteKit, for the delivery platform.

● Developed backend features using Python Django.

work.title: Co-Founder and CTO at fima.ai
work.description:
● Building an AI startup in stealth mode with co-founders.

● Addressing the problem of disjointed work information in traditional collaboration tools.

● Rethinking this issue from the ground up, considering society's current inflection point. Developing tools to fundamentally change the way work gets done.

work.title: Freelance Software Engineer | Data Analyst
work.description: ● Open to freelance contracts building mobile and web apps | solving computational problems.

work.title: Technical Lead at SovTech
work.description:
● Conducted software audits to ensure incoming software products could integrate seamlessly into available teams.

● Provided technical oversight, sharing insights from past project successes and failures.

● Conducted 1:1 sessions with developer teams to gauge career progress, set new growth milestones, identify team inefficiencies, and enhance overall developer happiness.

work.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer at SovTech
work.description:
● Individual contributor on a local e-hailing platform.

● Managed the development of two mobile apps, one web app, and the connected backend.

● Built automated tests that could virtually simulate the driver and passenger network.

● Involved in company-wide innovation projects, including hackathons.

work.title: Software Engineer at Warp Development
work.description:
● Implemented end-to-end test automation for the Karri Pay mobile app using Appium.

● Developed a mobile application for a fruit packing warehouse.

● Contributed to the development of the Medihelp health insurance PWA.

work.title: Software Developer at Lava Lamp Lab
work.description:
● Individual technical contributor on a mobile app project for a fitness on-demand startup, utilizing a hybrid app tech stack (Ionic/Angular) and Laravel on the backend.

● Part of a team that built a security alerting platform for a company managing Microsoft Azure Tenants for its clients.

work.title: Technical Intern at WC Colab for eInclusion and Social Innovation | Core Team
work.description:
● Focused on projects centered around applications development, robotics, machine learning, and designing courses to teach other students.

● Built a mobile application serving as a social hub for students to interact and share information about campus events.

work.title: Physics 151 Tutor at the University of the Western Cape
work.description: ● Worked as a tutor for a first-year physics laboratory course, assisting students in scientific experimentation with a focus on conceptual physics and measurement concepts.
